title: Mobile (pixel 2) goes for reboot randomly & this issue I faced when ever battery level is below 20%.
content:
Mobile (pixel 2) goes for reboot randomly & this issue I faced when ever battery level is below 20%.
I have observed this happens when I open camera or google map running (with battery level  <20%).
I am using pixel 2 since from almost 2 years I never faced battery issue, I use to charge only once in a day, but from last month I started charging 2/3 times in a day.

Mainly facing 2 issues
1. Random reboot
2. Battery drains fast.

Is this get fixed in next update?
